code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% ───────── Top-level flow ─────────
    [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> WaitForEntryRequest

    WaitForEntryRequest --> ProcSecCard : reqReadSecurityCard
    ProcSecCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : flagSecurityCardFailure
    ProcSecCard --> ProcBioData        : CardStatus==Valid
    ProcBioData  --> UnlockLockAP      : Authenticated
    UnlockLockAP --> WaitForEntryRequest : evAccessPointLocked

    %% ───────── Composite ① ─────────
    state "ProcessingSecurityCardData" as ProcSecCard {HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> ValidatingCard
        ValidatingCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount<3
        ValidatingCard --> Fail3Card           : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount>=3
        ValidatingCard --> exit                : CardStatus==Valid

        state Fail3Card {HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> DisableAccount
            DisableAccount --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ② ─────────
    state "ProcessingBiometricData" as ProcBioData {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> AuthenticatingBio
        AuthenticatingBio --> WaitForEntryRequest : BsTimeout
        AuthenticatingBio --> Fail3Bio           : BioScanFailure / BFailCount>=3
        AuthenticatingBio --> exit               : Authenticated

        state Fail3Bio {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> DisableAccountB
            DisableAccountB --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ③ ─────────
    state "UnlockingAndLockingAccessPoint" as UnlockLockAP {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> Locked
        Locked --> Unlocking : reqUnlockAccessPoint
        Unlocking --> Unlocked : evAccessPointUnlocked
        Unlocked --> Locked : reqLockAccessPoint
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的逻辑。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
